item.title: NPC Trouble
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“hitman2009, post:5, topic:304001”]one sec. i know how[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2009, 08:09:05 pm[/size][hr]Mk, this is all in NPChandler.java server sided.
Declare this underneath public class NPCHandler {

public int[] nofollownpc = {####};

is the NPC’s ID.

Then, make sure they’re aggressive (i assume u know how to do that)

Then search for if (npcs[NPCID].npcType !=
add the NPC’s ID amongst the others there. it’ll look like this below what you just searched:

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType != ####

is NPC’s ID.

Then search for if ((GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 30) == false) &&
Add the NPC ID amongst the ones below that code above.

Then search for if ((GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 1) == true)
You should see something like this below what you just searched:

(GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, #) == true) && (npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) ||

the # is how many squares away it can hit, and the #### is the NPC’s ID

Save, compile, and run your server. It should work.[/quote]

totally Fucking Copy and pasted Bud.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Trouble
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

one sec. i know how[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2009, 08:09:05 pm[/size][hr]Mk, this is all in NPChandler.java server sided.
Declare this underneath public class NPCHandler {

public int[] nofollownpc = {####};

is the NPC’s ID.

Then, make sure they’re aggressive (i assume u know how to do that)

Then search for if (npcs[NPCID].npcType !=
add the NPC’s ID amongst the others there. it’ll look like this below what you just searched:

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType != ####

is NPC’s ID.

Then search for if ((GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 30) == false) &&
Add the NPC ID amongst the ones below that code above.

Then search for if ((GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 1) == true)
You should see something like this below what you just searched:

(GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, #) == true) && (npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) ||

the # is how many squares away it can hit, and the #### is the NPC’s ID

Save, compile, and run your server. It should work.
